name: GetColor
desc: Returns the color set by {{ClassFunction|ContentIcon|SetColor}}

name: GetContentType
desc: Returns the content type used to save and restore the content icon in a spawnlist.

name: GetNPCWeapon
desc: Returns a table of weapon classes for the content icon with "NPC" content type to be randomly chosen from when user tries to spawn the NPC.

name: GetSpawnName
desc: Returns the internal "name" for the content icon, usually a class name for an entity.

name: OpenMenu
desc: A hook for override, by default does nothing. Called when user right clicks on the content icon, you are supposed to open a {{GlobalFunction|DermaMenu}} here with additional options.

name: SetAdminOnly
desc: Sets whether the content item is admin only. This makes the icon to display a admin icon in the top left corner of the icon.

name: SetColor
desc: Sets the color for the content icon. Currently is not used by the content icon panel.

name: SetContentType
desc: Sets the content type used to save and restore the content icon in a spawnlist.

name: SetMaterial
desc: Sets the material to be displayed as the content icon.

name: SetName
desc: Sets the tool tip and the "nice" name to be displayed by the content icon.

name: SetNPCWeapon
desc: Sets a table of weapon classes for the content icon with "NPC" content type to be randomly chosen from when user tries to spawn the NPC.

name: SetSpawnName
desc: Sets the internal "name" for the content icon, usually a class name for an entity.

name: ControlValues
desc: Called by spawnmenu functions (when creating a context menu) to fill this control with data.

name: ConVar
desc: Returns the ConVar}} for the panel to change/handle, set by {{ClassFunction|ContextBase|SetConVar

name: SetConVar
desc: Sets the ConVar for the panel to change/handle.

name: TestForChanges
desc: You should override this function and use it to check whether your convar value changed.

name: CaptureMouse
desc: {{Internal}} Used by the panel to perform mouse capture operations when adjusting the model.

name: FirstPersonControls
desc: {{Internal}} Used to adjust the perspective in the model panel via the keyboard, when the right mouse button is used.

name: GetFirstPerson
desc: Gets whether mouse and keyboard-based adjustment of the perspective has been enabled. See {{ClassFunction|DAdjustableModelPanel|SetFirstPerson}} for more information.

name: SetFirstPerson
desc: Enables mouse and keyboard-based adjustment of the perspective.

name: GetBarColor
desc: Returns the base color of the alpha bar. This is the color for which the alpha channel is being modified.

name: GetValue
desc: Returns the alpha value of the alpha bar.

name: OnChange
desc: Called when user changes the desired alpha value with the control.

name: SetBarColor
desc: Sets the base color of the alpha bar. This is the color for which the alpha channel is being modified.

name: SetValue
desc: Sets the alpha value or the alpha bar.

name: GetSelectedNumber
desc: Gets the code of the key currently bound by the DBinder. Same as {{ClassFunction|DBinder|GetValue}}.

name: SetSelected
desc: Sets the current key bound by the DBinder, and updates the button's text.

name: SetSelectedNumber
desc: {{Internal}} Sets the internal variable for the keycode only. To update the text and ConVar}}, you should use {{ClassFunction|DBinder|SetSelected.

name: SetValue
desc: Alias of {{ClassFunction|DBinder|SetSelected}}.

name: UpdateText
desc: {{Internal}} Used to set the text of the DBinder to the current key binding, or ''NONE''.

name: OpenForPos
desc: Sets the speech bubble position and size along with the dialog point position.

name: IsDown
desc: Returns true if the DButtion is currently depressed (a user is clicking on it).

name: SetConsoleCommand
desc: Sets a console command to be called when the button is clicked.

name: SetDisabled
desc: Sets whether or not the DButton is disabled.

name: SetEnabled
desc: Sets whether or not the DButton is enabled.

name: SetImage
desc: Sets an image to be displayed as the button's background.

name: UpdateColors
desc: {{Internal}} Called to update the DButton's style when its state is changed.

name: Add
desc: Adds a DCollapsibleCategory to the list.

name: AddItem
desc: Adds an element to the list.

name: UnselectAll
desc: Calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|UnselectAll}} on all child elements, if they have it.

name: DoClick
desc: Called when the checkbox is clicked by a user. If you are overriding this, you must call {{ClassFunction|DCheckBox|Toggle}}, else the checkbox will not respond to user clicks.

name: GetChecked
desc: Gets the checked state of the checkbox.

name: IsEditing
desc: Returns whether the state of the checkbox is being edited. This means whether the user is currently clicking (mouse-down) on the checkbox, and applies to both the left and right mouse buttons.

name: OnChange
desc: Called when the "checked" state is changed.

name: SetChecked
desc: Sets the checked state of the checkbox. Does not call the checkbox's {{ClassFunction|DCheckBox|OnChange}} and {{ClassFunction|Panel|ConVarChanged}} methods, unlike {{ClassFunction|DCheckBox|SetValue}}.

name: SetValue
desc: Sets the checked state of the checkbox, and calls the checkbox's {{ClassFunction|DCheckBox|OnChange}} and {{ClassFunction|Panel|ConVarChanged}} methods.

name: Toggle
desc: Toggles the checked state of the checkbox, and calls the checkbox's {{ClassFunction|DCheckBox|OnChange}} and {{ClassFunction|Panel|ConVarChanged}} methods. This is called by {{ClassFunction|DCheckBox|DoClick}}.

name: GetExpanded
desc: Returns whether the DCollapsibleCategory is expanded or not.

name: SetAnimTime
desc: Sets the time in seconds it takes to expand the DCollapsibleCategory

name: SetContents
desc: Sets the contents of the DCollapsibleCategory.

name: SetExpanded
desc: Sets whether the DCollapsibleCategory is expanded or not upon opening the container

name: SetLabel
desc: Sets the name of the DCollapsibleCategory.

name: GetRGB
desc: Returns the color cube's current set color.

name: OnUserChanged
desc: Function which is called when the color cube slider is moved (through user input). Meant to be overridden.

name: SetBaseRGB
desc: Sets the base color and the color used to draw the color cube panel itself.

name: SetColor
desc: Sets the base color of the color cube and updates the slider position.

name: TranslateValues
desc: Updates the color cube RGB based on the given x and y position and returns its arguments. Similar to {{ClassFunction|DColorCube|UpdateColor}}.

name: UpdateColor
desc: Updates the color cube RGB based on the given x and y position. Similar to {{ClassFunction|DColorCube|TranslateValues}}.

name: GetAlphaBar
desc: Return true if alpha bar is shown, false if not.

name: GetPalette
desc: Return true if palette is shown, false if not.

name: GetWangs
desc: Return true if the wangs are shown, false if not.

name: SetAlphaBar
desc: Show/Hide the alpha bar in DColorMixer

name: SetPalette
desc: Show or hide the palette panel

name: SetWangs
desc: Show / Hide the colors indicators in DColorMixer

name: AddSheet
desc: Adds a new column/tab.

name: SetActiveButton
desc: {{Internal}}Makes a button an active button for this DColumnSheet.

name: UseButtonOnlyStyle
desc: Makes the tabs/buttons show only the image and no text.

name: AddChoice
desc: Adds a choice to the combo box

name: ChooseOption
desc: Selects a combo box option by its index and changes the text displayed at the top of the combo box.

name: ChooseOptionID
desc: Selects an option within a combo box based on its table index.

name: Clear
desc: Clears the combo box's text value, choices, and data values.

name: CloseMenu
desc: Closes the combo box menu. Called when the combo box is clicked while open.

name: GetOptionData
desc: Returns an option's data based on the given index.

name: GetOptionText
desc: Returns an option's text based on the given index.

name: GetSelected
desc: Returns the currently selected option's text and data

name: GetSelectedID
desc: Returns the index (ID) of the currently selected option.

name: IsMenuOpen
desc: Returns whether or not the combo box's menu is opened.

name: OnSelect
desc: Internal function which is called when an option in the combo box is selected. This function does nothing by default and is meant to be overridden in order to make the combo box functional.

name: SetValue
desc: Sets the text shown in the combo box when the menu is not collapsed.

name: MakeDroppable
desc: Makes the panel a receiver for any droppable panel with the same DnD name.

name: GetOpenSize
desc: Return the Open Size of DDrawer.

name: GetOpenTime
desc: Return the Open Time of DDrawer.

name: SetOpenSize
desc: Set the height of DDrawer

name: SetOpenTime
desc: Set the time (in seconds) for DDrawer to open.

name: GetBaseFolder
desc: Returns the root directory/folder of the file tree.

name: GetCurrentFolder
desc: Returns the current directory/folder being displayed.

name: GetFileTypes
desc: Returns the current file type filter on the file list.

name: GetFolderNode
desc: Returns the DTree Node that the file tree stems from.

name: GetModels
desc: Returns whether or not the model viewer mode is enabled. In this mode, files are displayed as SpawnIcons instead of a list.

name: GetName
desc: Returns the name being used for the file tree.

name: SetOpen
desc: Returns whether or not the file tree is open.

name: SetPath
desc: Returns the access path of the file tree. This is ''GAME'' unless changed with {{ClassFunction|DFileBrowser|SetPath}}.

name: GetSearch
desc: Returns the current search filter on the file tree.

name: OnDoubleClick
desc: Called when a file is double-clicked.

name: OnRightClick
desc: Called when a file is right-clicked.

name: OnSelect
desc: Called when a file is selected.

name: SetBaseFolder
desc: Sets the root directory/folder of the file tree.

name: SetPath
desc: Sets the directory/folder from which to display the file list.

name: SetFileTypes
desc: Sets the file type filter for the file list.

name: SetModels
desc: Enables or disables the model viewer mode. In this mode, files are displayed as SpawnIcons instead of a list.

name: SetName
desc: Sets the name to use for the file tree.

name: SetOpen
desc: Opens or closes the file tree.

name: SetPath
desc: Sets the access path for the file tree. This is set to ''GAME'' by default.

name: SetSearch
desc: Sets the search filter for the file tree.

name: Setup
desc: {{Internal}} Called to set up the DTree and file viewer when a base path has been set.

name: SetupTree
desc: {{Internal}} Called to set up the DListView}} or {{Type|DIconBrowser}} by {{ClassFunction|DFileBrowser|Setup.

name: ShowFolder
desc: {{Internal}}Builds the file or icon list for the current directory.

name: SortFiles
desc: Sorts the file list.

name: AddItem
desc: Adds one or two items to the DForm.

name: Button
desc: Adds a DButton}} onto the {{Type|DForm

name: CheckBox
desc: Adds a DCheckBoxLabel}} onto the {{Type|DForm

name: ComboBox
desc: Adds a DComboBox}} onto the {{Type|DForm

name: ControlHelp
desc: Adds a DLabel}} onto the {{Type|DForm}}. Unlike {{ClassFunction|DForm|Help, this is indented and is colored blue, depending on the derma skin.

name: Help
desc: Adds a DLabel}} onto the {{Type|DForm as a helper

name: ListBox
desc: Adds a DListBox}} onto the {{Type|DForm

name: NumberWang
snippet: NumberWang(${1:string label},${2:string convar},${3:number min},${4:number max},${5:number decimals=nil})
desc: Adds a DNumberWang}} onto the {{Type|DForm

name: NumSlider
snippet: NumSlider(${1:string label},${2:string convar},${3:number min},${4:number max},${5:number decimals=nil})
desc: Adds a DNumSlider}} onto the {{Type|DForm

name: PanelSelect
desc: Creates a DPanelSelect and docks it to the top of the DForm.

name: TextEntry
desc: Adds a DTextEntry}} to a {{Type|DForm

name: Center
desc: Centers the frame relative to the whole screen and invalidates its layout. This overrides {{ClassFunction|Panel|Center}}.

name: Close
desc: Hides or removes the DFrame, and calls {{ClassFunction|DFrame|OnClose}}.

name: GetBackgroundBlur
desc: Gets whether the background behind the frame is being blurred.

name: GetDeleteOnClose
desc: Determines whether or not the DFrame will be removed when it is closed. This is set with {{ClassFunction|DFrame|SetDeleteOnClose}}.

name: GetDraggable
desc: Gets whether or not the frame is draggable by the user.

name: GetIsMenu
desc: Gets whether or not the frame is part of a derma menu. This is set with {{ClassFunction|DFrame|SetIsMenu}}.

name: GetMinHeight
desc: Gets the minimum height the DFrame can be resized to by the user.

name: GetMinWidth
desc: Gets the minimum width the DFrame can be resized to by the user.

name: GetPaintShadow
desc: Gets whether or not the shadow effect bordering the DFrame is being drawn.

name: GetScreenLock
desc: Gets whether or not the DFrame is restricted to the boundaries of the screen resolution.

name: GetSizable
desc: Gets whether or not the DFrame can be resized by the user.

name: IsActive
desc: Determines if the frame or one of its children has the screen focus.

name: OnClose
desc: Called when the DFrame is closed with {{ClassFunction|DFrame|Close}}. This applies when the ''close'' button in the DFrame's control box is clicked.

name: SetBackgroundBlur
desc: Blurs background behind the frame.

name: SetDeleteOnClose
desc: Determines whether or not the DFrame is removed when it is closed with {{ClassFunction|DFrame|Close}}.

name: SetDraggable
desc: Sets whether the frame should be draggable by the user. The DFrame can only be dragged from its title bar.

name: SetIsMenu
desc: Sets whether the frame is part of a derma menu or not.

name: SetMinHeight
desc: Sets the minimum height the DFrame can be resized to by the user.

name: SetMinWidth
desc: Sets the minimum width the DFrame can be resized to by the user.

name: SetPaintShadow
desc: Sets whether or not the shadow effect bordering the DFrame should be drawn.

name: SetScreenLock
desc: Sets whether the DFrame is restricted to the boundaries of the screen resolution.

name: SetSizable
desc: Sets whether or not the DFrame can be resized by the user.

name: SetTitle
desc: Sets the title of the frame.

name: ShowCloseButton
desc: Determines whether the DFrame's control box (close, minimise and maximise buttons) is displayed.

name: AddFunction
desc: Defines a Javascript function that when called will call a Lua callback.

name: Call
desc: Runs the code in the DHTML as Javascript.

name: ConsoleMessage
desc: Called when the page inside the DHTML window runs ''console.log''. This can also be called within the Lua environment to emulate ''console.log''. If the contained message begins with ''RUNLUA:'' the following text will be executed as code within the Lua environment (this is how Lua is called from DHTML windows).

name: GetAllowLua
desc: Returns if the loaded page can run Lua code, set by {{ClassFunction|DHTML|SetAllowLua}}

name: SetAllowLua
desc: Determines whether the loaded page can run Lua code or not. See DHTML for how to run Lua from a DHTML window.

name: SetScrollbars
desc: Determines whether the loaded window will display scrollbars when the page is larger than the viewing window. (Appears to be ineffective?)

name: Layout
desc: Resets layout vars before calling {{ClassFunction|Panel|InvalidateLayout}}. This is called when children are added or removed, and must be called when the spacing, border or layout direction is changed.

name: SetBorder
desc: Sets the internal border (padding) within the DIconLayout. This will not change its size, only the positioning of children. You must call {{ClassFunction|DIconLayout|Layout}} in order for the changes to take effect.

name: SetSpaceX
desc: Sets the horizontal (x) spacing between children within the DIconLayout. You must call {{ClassFunction|DIconLayout|Layout}} in order for the changes to take effect.

name: SetSpaceY
desc: Sets the vertical (y) spacing between children within the DIconLayout. You must call {{ClassFunction|DIconLayout|Layout}} in order for the changes to take effect.

name: GetImage
desc: Returns the image loaded in the image panel.

name: GetImageColor
desc: Returns the color override of the image panel.

name: SetImage
desc: Sets the image to load into the frame. If the first image can't be loaded and ''strBackup'' is set, that image will be loaded instead.

name: SetImageColor
desc: Sets the image's color override.

name: SetName
desc: Sets the killicon to be displayed. You should call {{ClassFunction|DKillIcon|SizeToContents}} following this.

name: SizeToContents
desc: Resizes the DKillIcon to fit the icon currently being shown. You should call this after {{ClassFunction|DKillIcon|SetName}}.

name: GetDisabled
desc: [[Category:DButton]] Gets the disabled state of the DLabel. This is set with {{ClassFunction|DLabel|SetDisabled}}.

name: GetFont
desc: [[Category:DButton]] Returns the current font of the DLabel. This is set with {{ClassFunction|DLabel|SetFont}}.

name: GetIsToggle
desc: Returns whether the toggle functionality is enabled for a label. Set with {{ClassFunction|DLabel|SetIsToggle}}.

name: GetToggle
desc: Returns the current toggle state of the label. This can be set with {{ClassFunction|DLabel|SetToggle}} and toggled with {{ClassFunction|DLabel|Toggle}}.

name: OnToggled
desc: Called when the toggle state of the label is changed by {{ClassFunction|DLabel|Toggle}}.

name: SetAutoStretchVertical
desc: Automatically adjusts the height of the label dependent of the height of the text inside of it.

name: SetBright
desc: Sets the color of the text to the bright text color defined in the skin.

name: SetDark
desc: Sets the color of the text to the dark text color defined in the skin.

name: SetFont
desc: [[Category:DButton]] Sets the font of the label.

name: SetIsToggle
desc: Enables or disables toggle functionality for a label. Retrieved with {{ClassFunction|DLabel|GetIsToggle}}.

name: SetText
desc: Set the Text of the DLabel VGUI element.

name: SetTextColor
desc: Sets the text color for the DLabel.

name: SetToggle
desc: Sets the toggle state of the label. This can be retrieved with {{ClassFunction|DLabel|GetToggle}} and toggled with {{ClassFunction|DLabel|Toggle}}.

name: SetWrap
desc: Sets whether or not text is wrapped within the bounds of the DLabel.

name: GetTextColor
desc: Gets the current text color of the DLabelURL. Same as {{ClassFunction|DLabelURL|GetColor}}.

name: SetColor
desc: Alias of {{ClassFunction|DLabelURL|SetTextColor}}.

name: SetTextColor
desc: Sets the text color of the DLabelURL. This should only be used immediately after it is created, and otherwise {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetFGColor}}.

name: OnModified
desc: Called when anything is dropped on or rearranged within the DListLayout. You should override this.

name: AddColumn
desc: Adds a column to the listview.

name: AddLine
desc: Adds a line to the list view.

name: DoDoubleClick
desc: Called when a line in the DListView is double clicked.

name: GetLine
desc: Gets the DListViewLine at the given index.

name: GetLines
desc: Gets all of the lines added to the DListView.

name: GetSelectedLine
desc: Gets the currently selected DListViewLine.

name: OnClickLine
desc: Called whenever a line is clicked.

name: OnRowSelected
desc: Called internally by {{ClassFunction|DListView|OnClickLine}} when a line is selected. This is the function you should override to define the behavior when a line is selected.

name: RemoveLine
desc: Removes a line from the list view.

name: SelectFirstItem
desc: Selects the line at the first index of the DListView if one has been added.

name: SelectItem
desc: Selects a line in the listview.

name: SetMultiSelect
desc: Sets the multiselect mode of the DListView.

name: SetSortable
desc: Enables/disables the sorting of columns by clicking.

name: SortByColumn
desc: Sorts the items in the specified column.

name: AddOption
desc: Add an option to the DMenu

name: AddSpacer
desc: Adds a horizontal line spacer.

name: AddSubMenu
desc: Add a sub menu to the DMenu

name: Open
desc: Opens the DMenu at the current mouse position

name: AddMenu
desc: Creates a new DMenu}} object tied to a {{Type|DButton with the given label on the menu bar.

name: AddOrGetMenu
desc: Retrieves a DMenu object from the menu bar. If one with the given label doesn't exist, a new one is created.

name: GetBackgroundColor
desc: Returns the DMenuBar's background color

name: GetDrawBackground
desc: Returns whether or not the background should be painted. Is the same as {{ClassFunction|DMenuBar|GetPaintBackground}}

name: GetOpenMenu
desc: If a menu is visible/opened, then the menu is returned.

name: GetPaintBackground
desc: Returns whether or not the background should be painted. Is the same as {{ClassFunction|DMenuBar|GetDrawBackground}}

name: SetBackgroundColor
desc: Sets the background color

name: SetDrawBackground
desc: Sets whether or not the background should be painted. Is the same as {{ClassFunction|DMenuBar|SetPaintBackground}}

name: SetPaintBackground
desc: Sets whether or not the background should be painted. Is the same as {{ClassFunction|DMenuBar|SetDrawBackground}}

name: DrawModel
desc: {{Internal}} Used by the DModelPanel's paint hook to draw the model and background.

name: GetAmbientLight
desc: Returns the ambient lighting used on the rendered entity.

name: GetAnimated
desc: Returns whether or not the panel entity should be animated when the default {{ClassFunction|DModelPanel|LayoutEntity}} function is called.

name: GetAnimSpeed
desc: Returns the animation speed of the panel entity, see {{ClassFunction|DModelPanel|SetAnimSpeed}}.

name: GetCamPos
desc: Returns the position of the model viewing camera.

name: GetEntity
desc: Returns the entity being rendered by the model panel.

name: GetFOV
desc: Returns the FOV (field of view) the camera is using.

name: GetLookAng
desc: Returns the angles of the model viewing camera. Is '''nil''' until changed with {{ClassFunction|DModelPanel|SetLookAng}}.

name: GetLookAt
desc: Returns the position the viewing camera is pointing toward.

name: GetModel
desc: Gets the model of the rendered entity.

name: LayoutEntity
desc: {{Internal}} By default, this function slowly rotates and animates the entity being rendered.

name: PostDrawModel
desc: Called when the entity of the DModelPanel was drawn.

name: PreDrawModel
desc: Called '''before''' the entity of the DModelPanel is drawn.

name: RunAnimation
desc: This function is used in the '''DModelPanel:LayoutEntity'''. It will set the active model to the last set animation using {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetSequence}}. By default, it is the walking animation.

name: SetAmbientLight
desc: Sets the ambient lighting used on the rendered entity.

name: SetAnimated
desc: Sets whether or not to animate the entity when the default {{ClassFunction|DModelPanel|LayoutEntity}} is called.

name: SetAnimSpeed
desc: Sets the speed used by {{ClassFunction|DModelPanel|RunAnimation}} to advance frame on an entity sequence.

name: SetCamPos
desc: Sets the position of the camera.

name: SetDirectionalLight
desc: Sets the directional lighting used on the rendered entity.

name: SetEntity
desc: Sets the entity to be rendered by the model panel.

name: SetFOV
desc: Sets the panel camera's FOV (field of view).

name: SetLookAng
desc: Sets the angles of the camera.

name: SetLookAt
desc: Makes the panel's camera face the given position.

name: SetModelList
desc: Called to set the list of models within the panel element.

name: GetLife
desc: Returns the display time in seconds of the DNotify. This is set with

name: SetLife
desc: Sets the display time in seconds for the DNotify.

name: GetFraction
desc: Returns a fraction representing the current number selector value to number selector min/max range ratio. If argument ''val'' is supplied, that number will be computed instead.

name: HideWang
desc: Hides the number selector arrows.

name: OnValueChanged
desc: Internal function which is called when the number selector value is changed. This function is empty by default so it needs to be overridden in order to provide functionality.

name: SetDecimals
desc: Sets the amount of decimal places allowed in the number selector.

name: SetFraction
desc: Sets the value of the number selector based on the given fraction number.

name: SetMax
desc: Sets the maximum numeric value allowed by the number selector.

name: SetMin
desc: Sets the minimum numeric value allowed by the number selector.

name: SetMinMax
desc: Sets the minimum and maximum value allowed by the number selector.

name: ValueChanged
desc: Called when the value has been changed. This will also be called when the user manually changes the value trough the text panel.

name: SetDisabled
desc: Sets whether or not to disable the panel.

name: SetDrawBackground
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|DPanel|SetPaintBackground}} instead.}}Sets whether or not to draw the panel background. Alias of {{ClassFunction|DPanel|SetPaintBackground}}.

name: SetPaintBackground
desc: Sets whether or not to paint/draw the panel background.

name: GetFraction
desc: Returns the progress bar's fraction. 0 is 0% and 1 is 100%.

name: SetFraction
desc: Sets the fraction of the progress bar. 0 is 0% and 1 is 100%.

name: AddChoice
desc: Add a choice to your combo control.

name: DataChanged
desc: Called after the user selects a new value.

name: SetSelected
desc: Set the selected option.

name: Setup
desc: Sets up a combo control.

name: Setup
desc: {{Internal}} Called by a property row to setup a color selection control.

name: SetValue
desc: Sets the color value of the property.

name: AddSheet
snippet: AddSheet(${1:string name},${2:Panel pnl},${3:string icon=nil},${4:boolean noStretchX=false},${5:boolean noStretchY=false},${6:string tooltip=nil})
desc: Adds a new tab.

name: OnChange
desc: Function which is called when the cursor is clicked and/or moved on the color picker. Meant to be overridden.

name: SetRGB
desc: Sets the color stored in the color picker.

name: AddItem
desc: Parents the passed panel to the DScrollPanel's canvas.

name: GetCanvas
desc: Returns the canvas ( The panel all child panels are parented to ) of the DScrollPanel.

name: GetPadding
desc: Gets the DScrollPanels padding

name: GetVBar
desc: Returns the vertical scroll bar of the panel.

name: InnerWidth
desc: Return the width of the DScrollPanel's canvas.

name: ScrollToChild
desc: Scrolls to the given child

name: SetCanvas
desc: {{Internal}}Sets the canvas of the DScrollPanel.

name: SetPadding
desc: Sets the DScrollPanels padding

name: SetType
desc: Sets the shape to be drawn.

name: GetMaterial
desc: Gets the material the sprite is using.

name: GetRotation
desc: Gets the 2D rotation angle of the sprite, in the plane of the screen.

name: SetMaterial
desc: Sets the source material for the sprite.

name: SetRotation
desc: Sets the 2D rotation angle of the sprite, in the plane of the screen.

name: OnChange
desc: Called internally by {{ClassFunction|DTextEntry|OnTextChanged}} when the user modifies the text in the DTextEntry.

name: OnKeyCodeTyped
desc: Called whenever a keyboard key is pressed while the DTextEntry is focused.

name: OnTextChanged
desc: Called internally when the text inside the DTextEntry changes.

name: OnValueChange
desc: Called internally when the text in the DTextEntry changes.

name: ClearTiles
desc: {{Internal}} Clears the panel's tile table. Used by {{ClassFunction|DTileLayout|LayoutTiles}}.

name: ConsumeTiles
desc: {{Internal}} Called to designate a range of tiles as occupied by a panel.

name: Copy
desc: Creates and returns an exact copy of the DTileLayout.

name: CopyContents
desc: Creates copies of all the children from the given panel object and parents them to this one.

name: FindFreeTile
desc: {{Internal}} Finds the coordinates of the first group of free tiles that fit the given size.

name: FitsInTile
desc: {{Internal}} Determines if a group of tiles is vacant.

name: GetBaseSize
desc: Returns the size of each single tile, set with {{ClassFunction|DTileLayout|SetBaseSize}}.

name: GetTile
desc: {{Internal}} Gets the occupied state of a tile.

name: LayoutTiles
desc: {{Internal}} Called by {{HookFunction|PANEL|PerformLayout}} to arrange and lay out the child panels, if it has changed in size.

name: SetBaseSize
desc: Sets the size of a single tile. If a child panel is larger than this size, it will occupy several tiles.

name: SetTile
desc: {{Internal}} Called to set the occupied state of a tile.

name: GetIndentSize
desc: Get the indent size of the DTree. Currently does nothing.

name: GetSelectedItem
desc: Returns the currently selected node.

name: GetShowIcons
desc: Returns whether or not the [[Silkicons]] next to each node of the DTree will be displayed.

name: Root
desc: Returns the root DTree_Node, the node that is the parent to all other nodes of the DTree.

name: SetIndentSize
desc: Set the indent size of the DTree. Currently does nothing.

name: SetSelectedItem
desc: Set the currently selected top-level node.

name: SetShowIcons
desc: Sets whether or not the [[Silkicons]] next to each node of the DTree will be displayed.

name: ShowIcons
desc: Returns whether or not the [[Silkicons]] next to each node of the DTree will be displayed.

name: AboveLayout
desc: Applies the top-down view camera settings for the model in the DAdjustableModelPanel.

name: BestGuessLayout
desc: Applies the best camera settings for the model in the DAdjustableModelPanel}}, using the values returned by {{GlobalFunction|PositionSpawnIcon.

name: FillAnimations
desc: {{Internal}} Fills the DListView}} on the left of the editor with the model entity's animation list. Called by {{ClassFunction|IconEditor|Refresh.

name: FullFrontalLayout
desc: Applies the front view camera settings for the model in the DAdjustableModelPanel.

name: OriginLayout
desc: Places the camera at the origin (0,0,0), relative to the entity, in the DAdjustableModelPanel.

name: Refresh
desc: Updates the internal DAdjustableModelPanel}} and {{Type|SpawnIcon.

name: RenderIcon
desc: Re-renders the SpawnIcon.

name: RightLayout
desc: Applies the right side view camera settings for the model in the DAdjustableModelPanel.

name: SetDefaultLighting
desc: {{Internal}} Sets up the default ambient and directional lighting for the DAdjustableModelPanel}}. Called by {{ClassFunction|IconEditor|Refresh.

name: SetFromEntity
desc: Sets the editor's model and icon from an entity. Alternative to {{ClassFunction|IconEditor|SetIcon}}, with uses a SpawnIcon.

name: SetIcon
desc: Sets the SpawnIcon}} to modify. You should call {{ClassFunction|Panel|Refresh immediately after this, as the user will not be able to make changes to the icon beforehand.

name: UpdateEntity
desc: {{Internal}} Updates the entity being rendered in the internal DAdjustableModelPanel}}. Called by the model panel's {{ClassFunction|DModelPanel|LayoutEntity method.

name: SetAlpha
desc: Sets the alpha value of the Material panel.

name: SetMaterial
desc: Sets the material used by the panel.
